title: Support for Democracy and Rule of Law

content.question: Respond to all parts of the question: Using the table, describe the data for the rule by military in Nigeria. Using the data in the table, describe a trend for rule by strong leader. Describe what rule by law means. Using the data in the table, draw a conclusion about representative democracy in the United Kingdom. How would the data explain a consequence sometimes associated with direct democracy?

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question: Using the table, describe the data for the rule by military in Nigeria. Using the data in the table, describe a trend for rule by strong leader. Describe what rule by law means. Using the data in the table, draw a conclusion about representative democracy in the United Kingdom. How would the data explain a consequence sometimes associated with direct democracy?
